question: You recently took a trip with a taxi company. The driver behaved in an unacceptable way and you had a lot of problems. You complained to the company but no-one has replied to your complaint.Write a letter to the taxi company. In your lettersay why you are writing and how you feelexplain what happenedtell them what you would like them to do.
text: I am writing this letter with regards to bringing your attention to one of the problems I have faced with your Uber driver, who cancelled my ride due to the payment method I selected. This caused  huge trouble for me as I was about to miss my exam.

actually, I have an important exam in the north of the city at my university and so I decided to take an Uber. I waited for it in my location for 30 minutes but unfortunately, he did not come.  I called  him and he said, due to my online payment he cancelled that request. I had to cancel that trip. Moreover, I had to take another taxi and I was under pressure because of his actions .

I would appreciate it if you consider the situation and try to solve the problem of payment online. on the other hand, I expect the driver to give explanations for his bad behaviour. in addition, all of the charges that were deducted from my account were returned. and since that, this happened had a huge impact on my exam, I  emphasized I do not accept any excuse.
Thank you for taking the time and your consideration of my letter.I looking forward to hearing from you as soon.
